income_messages:
From: y***a@yahoo.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-09 07:13:31
SUBJECT: Good day to you and family, My
Good day to you and family, My Name is Yu Guangzhou from Hong-Kong. I
have a business proposal that will significantly benefit both of us. I
need a credible partner in your country that will assist me in using
these funds to help the less privileged.
I am a retired Minister of the General Administration of Customs
forgive me if you see my business proposal as shameful and not
honorable; please excuse me and understand that this is the situation
I am in, and I must find a credible partner in your country to help me
move these funds and invest them into a lucrative business properly.
Please 
this transaction is 100% risk-free and legal; you have nothing
to worry about. Please let me know your country of residence, Name,
direct mobile phone number and occupation.
I would like you to receive this money deposited in 2018. When the
money is in your bank account, I want to use 20% of the money for
charity to assist orphanages (You will spearhead this project and not
mention my Name). You will receive 40% as your commission, and I will
take the remaining 40% as my share, which I intend to invest in any
lucrative business in your country.
Please consider this proposal and reply to me soon. It will certainly
do you no good to report me to my government authorities or divulge
this information to any person because doing so will only destroy my
person and my career. Please respond to this Email for more
information  :  
y_gua@yahoo.com
I await your response so we can forge ahead with this transaction.
Best regards
Yu Guangzhou.
From: y***a@yahoo.com
To: zi97069@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-09 23:06:22
SUBJECT: Re:  Read carefully and reply Matthew
Hello  Matthew
It matters most to me at this time in my life because this is a huge amount of funds. Thirty Million United State Dollars involved which is all I have worked for all my life as a public office of the People's Republic of china. 
Since I am under arrest in the past 6 years , the funds was put in a dormant account by the bank, so i am not able to lay claims to my  money hence i contacted you to help me take care of this and move this funds into your bank account , you will have to activate the account that is all you need to do to have access to transfer into your account from Chase Private offshore bank online.
I want to be very sure so that we don't waste our time , i state it in my previous email to you to kindly state your country, full names, Age, Mobile cell number or WhatsApp number and occupation because I want some one that reside outside china that will assist me accomplished this great task for the needy and invest my 40% in any lucrative business in your country.
I await your response for more details .
Yours Truly Yu Guangzho
From: y***a@yahoo.com
To: zi97069@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-12 19:10:52
SUBJECT: Re:  Read carefully and reply Matthew
Hello Matthew
Nothing will affect your company names, my attorney will work out all legal documents of funds in your names, Since I am under arrest in the past 6 years , the funds was put in a dormant account by the bank, so I am not able to lay claims to my  money hence i contacted you to help me take care of this and move this funds into your bank account , you will have to activate the account that is all you need to do to have access to transfer into your account from Chase Private offshore bank online.
I want you to understand that this is 100% legal, please keep details of this transaction to yourself to avoid raise of eyebrow to me and family, state your country, full names, Age, Mobile cell number or WhatsApp number and occupation because I want some one that reside outside china that will assist me accomplished this great task for the needy and invest my 40% in any lucrative business in your country.
I await your response with for more details .Best regards
Yu
